channel.title: PS3 Copy of Portal 2 gives away Steam Download
channel.description: Hey guys, so for those who didn't know the PS3 version on Portal 2 supposedly comes with a code for a free download for Portal 2 on Steam. Obviously its asking alot but if someone nice enough in the community would be so gracious to send me there code I would very much appreciate it. I don't wanna ask people to just hand it out but i figured if anyone without an intention of activating their code, they could decide to let it sit there or let me bask in the glory of the new game. I thank whoever in advanced very much!

atticus1259:

im not trying to abuse it, im just asking someone if they have a code that they know they wont use, i might be able to have it. its kind of expensive right now but i wanna play it, if not i’ll just wait till the games on sale and then purchase it.

item.title: PS3 Copy of Portal 2 gives away Steam Download
item.dc:creator: GuitarJim
item.description:
The code won’t work with Steam on the PC, you have to enter it on the PS3 to unlock your PC version and to play online with the PS3. It really isn’t that hard to understand.

Read full topic

item.title: PS3 Copy of Portal 2 gives away Steam Download
item.dc:creator: GuitarJim
item.description:
In order to play online with portal 2 you have to enter the code in steamworks on PS3. This then entitles you to the steam PC version too. If someone were to give you their code it would mean they forfeit playing online coop, which at the moment is impossible for PS3 players anyway.

Read full topic
